data.name: Outcasts of Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action
Being in the role of a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons and spells, defend your kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders.

Battle enemies through a story-based campaign across multiple difficulty dungeon-like levels and upgrade your combat skills to match better your unique play style.
Will you disintegrate ghouls with a powerful electric stream, pound scavengers flat with a sky falling rock spell, or freeze flying gargoyles and shatter them with a magic blast? No matter the weapons you choose, you’re sure the invaders will be crushed!

Features:
-Procedurally generated dungeons – Twisting passages, long halls and wide-open chambers all need a war mage to clear them
-Story-based Campaign – Fend off monsters across four acts to discover the mysterious power behind their relentless assaults
-12 Unique Enemies – Including scavengers, ghouls, flying gargoyles, and of course, a whole bunch of ugly orcs
-Multiple Weapons and Spells – From spear and sword to the magical power of the elements
-Persistent Upgrades – Unlock improvements to your weapons and magic spells as you progress through the campaign
-Outfit Usage – Light armor suits better for achieving, the best mobility and heavy armor for more defense potential
-Scoring System and Leaderboard – Compete with your friends for the title of Master Outcaster!

data.short_description: Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action Being in the role of a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons and spells, defend your kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
